meanings.definition: The action of modifying or personalizing something according to individual preferences.
meanings.sent1: The customization of the car's interior made it unique to the owner.
meanings.sent2: Online stores offer customization options for customers to personalize their products.
meanings.sent3: The customization of the cake with a funny message made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her customization of the room transformed it into a cozy retreat.
meanings.sent5: The customization of the phone case with glitter and gems made it sparkle.

meanings.definition: The process of making changes to suit a particular individual or purpose.
meanings.sent1: The customization of the training program helped each employee excel.
meanings.sent2: Software companies provide customization services to tailor programs to specific needs.
meanings.sent3: The customization of the outfit for the party turned heads.
meanings.sent4: His customization of the presentation captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The customization of the garden layout created a peaceful oasis.
